item.title: What can Borges teach you about overfitting?
item.description: Jorge Luis Borges (1899-1986) was a brilliant writter and one of the most influential authors of all times. His tales are a must-read for anyone interested in science/science-fiction. But what can Borges teach you about overfitting?
